'''Calling Down the Thunder''' is a daily [[commission]] in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Some scoundrels are up to no good, researching an object that possesses the power of [[Electro]]. Stop them, and quick!}}
# Defeat all opponents

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Enemies==
